history.content:
1. Yes you should take courses.

2. 162 is a difficult project-based class. 3 upper division technicals will be a lot of work, but you know yourself and your limits best.

children.subject: That is a difficult course load, but not impossible. I haven’t taken 186 yet so I can’t speak to its workload/difficulty, but 161 is a fairly light workload. File storage project is perhaps the only assignment in that class that could take a decent amount of time. 162 is heavy on projects, but you also do get to share the workload with others. So if you think you have a reliable team in 162, the schedule should be manageable. However, like said above, you know yourself best. Good luck!
186 is relatively light, the hw/projects don't take that long if you keep up with lecture.

history.content: So I'm currently enrolled in 161, 162, and 186. It seems like a reasonable schedule but I've been receiving a lot of mixed reviews and different opinions (including ones saying that I should drop either 161 or 186). Could anybody give me some insight on whether or not I should take these 3 courses together? Thanks.
history.subject: My Schedule - Should I take courses?
